WsFed.MetadataAddress: [Federation Metadata URL for the AAD Enterprise App SSO blade, e.g. 'https://login.microsoftonline.com/<Tenant_ID>/federationmetadata/2007-06/federationmetadata.xml?appid=<App_ID>']
WsFed.Wtrealm: [The App Identifier (Entity ID) URI from the AAD Enterprise App SSO blade, e.g. 'https://<App_Identifier>/']
